statements: SELECT * FROM festival_lineup;
SELECT artist_name, stage_name, performance_time FROM festival_lineup ORDER BY performance_time DESC;
SELECT artist_name FROM festival_lineup WHERE stage_name = 'Main Stage';
SELECT * FROM festival_lineup WHERE performance_time BETWEEN '2022-09-10' AND '2022-09-12';
SELECT DISTINCT stage_name FROM festival_lineup;
SELECT * FROM festival_lineup WHERE artist_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY performance_time DESC;
SELECT artist_name, stage_name FROM festival_lineup WHERE performance_time BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31';
SELECT DISTINCT artist_name FROM festival_lineup WHERE stage_name IN ('Main Stage', 'Acoustic Stage');
SELECT event_id, artist_name, performance_time FROM festival_lineup WHERE stage_name = 'VIP Stage' AND performance_time > '2022-09-15' ORDER BY event_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_artists FROM festival_lineup WHERE performance_time < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND stage_name = 'Main Stage';
SELECT * FROM festival_event_lineup WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT artist_name, stage_name FROM festival_event_lineup WHERE stage_name IN ('Main Stage', 'Acoustic Stage');
SELECT event_id, artist_name, performance_time FROM festival_event_lineup ORDER BY performance_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM festival_stage WHERE location = 'Outdoor';
SELECT stage_name, location FROM festival_stage ORDER BY stage_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM festival_event_lineup WHERE performance_time < '2023-01-01';
SELECT event_id, artist_name, stage_name FROM festival_event_lineup WHERE artist_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY performance_time DESC;
SELECT stage_name, COUNT(artist_name) AS artist_count FROM festival_event_lineup GROUP BY stage_name HAVING artist_count > 1 ORDER BY artist_count DESC;
SELECT fe.artist_name, fs.location FROM festival_event_lineup fe JOIN festival_stage fs ON fe.stage_name = fs.stage_name WHERE fe.performance_time > '2022-06-01' AND fs.location = 'London';
SELECT MAX(performance_time) AS latest_performance FROM festival_event_lineup;
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Pop'
SELECT artist_name FROM artists ORDER BY artist_name DESC
SELECT artist_id, artist_name FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Rock'
SELECT * FROM performance_times WHERE start_time > '2023-01-01'
SELECT stage_name FROM stages
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Rock'
SELECT * FROM artists ORDER BY artist_name DESC
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY artist_name ASC
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists WHERE artist_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Hip-hop'
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_id, artist_name FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY artist_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date;
SELECT stage_name, capacity FROM stages WHERE capacity >= 500 ORDER BY stage_name;
SELECT performance_id, event_id, artist_id, stage_id, performance_time FROM performances WHERE performance_time < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY performance_time DESC;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT * FROM stages WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY stage_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT artist_name, stage_name, performance_time FROM artists JOIN performances ON artists.artist_id = performances.artist_id JOIN stages ON stages.stage_id = performances.stage_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM performances WHERE performance_time >= NOW();
SELECT * FROM festival;
SELECT festival_name, location FROM festival;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artist WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT lineup_id, artist_id, stage_id FROM lineup ORDER BY performance_time DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, price FROM ticket WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM festival ORDER BY festival_name DESC, location ASC;

SELECT lineup_id, festival_name, artist_name, stage_name, performance_time FROM lineup INNER JOIN festival ON lineup.festival_id = festival.festival_id INNER JOIN artist ON lineup.artist_id = artist.artist_id INNER JOIN stage ON lineup.stage_id = stage.stage_id WHERE lineup.performance_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(lineup_id) AS performance_count FROM artist INNER JOIN lineup ON artist.artist_id = lineup.artist_id GROUP BY artist_name HAVING COUNT(lineup_id) >= 3;

SELECT DISTINCT festival_name, MAX(price) AS max_ticket_price FROM festival INNER JOIN lineup ON festival.festival_id = lineup.festival_id INNER JOIN ticket ON lineup.lineup_id = ticket.lineup_id GROUP BY festival_name ORDER BY max_ticket_price DESC;

SELECT lineup_id, artist_name, price FROM lineup INNER JOIN artist ON lineup.artist_id = artist.artist_id INNER JOIN ticket ON lineup.lineup_id = ticket.lineup_id WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC, artist_name ASC;
